meanings.definition: A diagnostic procedure used to examine the kidneys and urinary tract.
meanings.sent1: The pyelography helped the doctor see inside the kidneys clearly.
meanings.sent2: The hospital performed a pyelography to check for any issues in the urinary system.
meanings.sent3: During the pyelography, the kidneys seemed to pose for the X-ray!
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity about the kidneys was satisfied through the pyelography.
meanings.sent5: The pyelography revealed the hidden secrets of the urinary tract.

meanings.definition: The process of taking X-ray images of the renal pelvis and ureters after injecting a contrast medium.
meanings.sent1: After the pyelography, the doctor analyzed the X-ray images carefully.
meanings.sent2: The technician prepared the equipment for the pyelography procedure.
meanings.sent3: The contrast medium used in pyelography made the kidneys look like a work of art!
meanings.sent4: The pyelography captured the inner workings of the urinary system like a skilled photographer.
meanings.sent5: Through pyelography, the renal pelvis and ureters were brought into focus.
